subject: Re: [junit] When running a test suite a private static final field 	Object is null. Why?
msgSnippet: If you have static code, the execution of the static code flows from the top of the file to the bottom.  It could be possible for this code to execute above

If you have static code, the execution of the static code flows from the to=
p
of the file to the bottom.  It could be possible for this code to execute=

above the setting of the LOCK variable.  At which time the variable will b=
e
null.
